text: Hello.
hello

You have the opportunity to donate some or all of your incoming bonus payment ($2) to a charity called Save the Children. Save the Children is a non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.
sure I'll donate $0.25 to the charity

This is a great charity. I donate to it twice a year myself. Many of the children are living in terrible conditions, such as the children facing daily violence in Syria. It also provides food for children that are starving all over the world.
oh that's terrible! That's so great that this charity helps out and gives back to those children.  I'm happy to help, even just a little!
Your donation can prevent the death of a child suffering from hunger.
That's so great, I'm happy to hear that.  I really hate to hear of children dying of starvation.
Also, this is a very credible charity. You know that your donation is being used for what it is supposed to be used for.
That's so great to know. I hear of so many charities not using the money the proper way and that is upsetting.

Another thing about this charity is that a small amount of money goes a long way. For you $2 dollars could buy one meal, but for a refugee child 77 cents could make the difference of safety. 77 cents a day can provide shelter to a refugee family.
that's great! I'm happy to donate $0.25 to help this charity out.
155 million children have been helped by this charity so far - it does a lot of good!
That's so great, I'm happy to hear that so many children have been helped!
Save the Children also provides assistance in emergency situations - like Hurrican Harvey, for example.
Oh that is super great, we've been through a few hurricanes ourselves and it's great to see so many people come help out.
Even a year later, this charity is still helping victims of the Hurrican Harvey.
Good, I'm glad to hear that they haven't just given up on those people.

Now that we have talked about Save the Children in a little more depth. I would like to ask you How much do you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment ($2).
I'd like to donate $0.25  to help out Save the Children
